Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Bloodthirst, the priest's sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Necronis, the priest's sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see "Wrath Of Ngurct," the high priest's sword. The blade seems to pulse and quiver; the hilt is inlaid with rubies.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the minotaur's double-bladed axe on the ground. It is highly polished steel; the edge is hard and razor-sharp. Four sapphires (uncut) adorn the hilts.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The mummy drops the silver ankh it clutched in deathbed irony.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a finely-wrought but unornamented sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Gonzales' sword; it's a good off the rack sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Alkanda's scimitar. The blade is black and wickedly curved. The hilt is studded with dark gems -- opals, dark sapphire, stygian beryl. The grip is wrapped with human leather.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Hero's sword. It's a huge two-handed broadsword; the blade's five feet long. The hilt is heavy, hammered brass, and bears a single diamond.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a mess of silver, copper and a couple gold coins on a bunk.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There's a pile of copper coins by one of the old bunks.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see five copper ingots on a table.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There's a bag of silver coins on the table.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a foot-tall black stone idol of a truly hideous monster; its fangs are bared and dripping, its talons curled to strike, its eyes glowing with a hidden fire.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a statue of a truly hideous monster; its fangs bared and dripping gore, its talons curled to strike, its eyes glowing with a hidden fire. It is so well crafted, it looks almost alive.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large chest, wrapped with iron bands and locked with a steel padlock.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dazzling assortment of jewels of every type and color; emeralds, rubies, diamonds, sapphires, moonstones, beryls, crafted into necklaces, brooches, jeweled daggers: lots and lots of goodies.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a glittering stack of gold bars.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bulging sack prominently labelled "gold coins."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a collection of semi-precious stones by a bunk -- agates, and jasper, and jade.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a slew of copper and silver coins that were spilled when you walked in.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a ruby stickpin on the officer's uniform lapel.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a very old book, left lying out on a table. It's open to the dedication page, which reads: "To all followers of Ngurct, to whom these secrets are known" and, of course, there's more in the book than that.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a body on the floor; it is that of a dead mage. His head hangs by but a thread; his throat is ripped out. In his hand you see a blood-stained wand: from the charred walls you deduce that it's a fireball wand.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the mage's finger you see a golden ring; it bears a ruby that glints and flickers. On the inside is an insription in odd but readable script.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find a silver scarab in the sarcophagus!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A scintillating pile of uncut, polished diamonds attracts your attention.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a carcass roasting on a spit. Somehow the haunch looks familiar.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a steaming roast pig, just out of the oven.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a flagon of wine on the table. A whiff near takes your head off.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an iron key hanging from a peg on the wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a ring of keys on the table by the book.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find a ring of keys under the dead guard's body.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a steel key glinting in a corner.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an intricately crafted silver dagger.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an assortment of beautiful silk robes on a rack against the wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A stack of old, rusty blade blanks leans against one wall. They're still in good shape.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a gold medallion with a truly hideous monster's -- face? -- on it: fangs dripping gore, and all that. Its chain is broken, and it's lying next to the demised girl on the bed.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the sacrificial dagger of Ngurct on the ground; the hilt and grip are jeweled; the deeply fluted blade is made of solid gold.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a gold candelabra; it has held stinking blood-red candles before; it is covered with old wax.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a ring set with a large faceted sapphire on a table by the bed.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a slave girl tied loosely to the bed. Her torso is criss-crossed with shallow lacerations.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The south wall of the chamber is covered with strange hieroglyphs.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have found a secret door in the north wall!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have found a secret door in the south wall!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a strong oak door south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the south wall is a cell door locked with a huge padlock: from within come imploring cries -- "Free us!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The door to the east is @@002.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The door to the west is evidently @@003.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
